roleset.name: process of becoming covered in epithelial cells, usually during wound healing

role.descr: thing becoming covered in epithelial cells
instrument, medication, aid in healing process

roleset.note: Based on Sharp data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.

example.name: with an instrument to speed epithelialization
with topical medication
example.text: Enhancement of epithelialization with topical zinc oxide.
